title: thin san serif that's a little different
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724101841im_/http:/typophile.com/files/diamond_edge_logo_6648.jpg)

Hello,  
Cannot figure out what this font is. I like how clean it is, yes it's a little different than the san serifs usually floating around.  
Any help would be super appreciated!  
Thanks so much!  
Jenn

ps- this is my second (?) time here so if there is forum edict I'm missing, I'm really sorry!  
pps- sorry I can't give more helpful thoughts on the typeface in question!
author: hinklej15

comments.content: This is probably **[Isonorm](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724101841/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=URW&ffam=IsonormD%20-%20Regular&fid=d58a6b123f1013c9bc4ab4af354a96bf&fsize=60&text=DIAMOND%20EDGE&wrap=2)** available from URW++, Linotype, Mecanorma, Elsner+Flake, Font Font + others
